step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your hands clasped loosely in your lap as you begin.
You're raising your hands well. Try to keep your elbows a little closer together as you bring them towards your forehead.
Nicely done spreading your elbows wide behind your head. Ensure your head stays upright and avoid pulling forward.
Holding steady! Maintain this position, focusing on keeping your head up and elbows wide.
Smooth return to the starting position. Remember to keep your head upright throughout the movement.
Second rep, starting strong with hands clasped. Keep them relaxed in your lap.
Good job bringing hands toward your forehead. Focus on keeping those elbows in a bit closer.
Excellent spread of the elbows behind your head. Keep your head tall and avoid any forward pull.
Holding the stretch well. Remember to keep your head upright and elbows wide.
Great job completing the reverse motion. You're returning to the start smoothly.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Focus on keeping your elbows closer together as you raise your hands, and maintain an upright head position throughout. This helps maximize the stretch and promote lymphatic flow.
